author: elecharny
msg: o We don't anymore create a new buffer in the readHandle() method.
o The getAddressAsString() method has been removed : we don't anymore store the boundHandles using a String, but directly using the SocketAddress. This is a major speedup.

author: cframpton
msg: Each test should cleanup by calling endDrag.  Replace Pause tags with WaitForLayoutManager tags.
